https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tr8vuukXngm9xkJE4g5uKLpXbZp.jpg The worlds of a depressed psychologist and an emotionally disturbed homeless woman collide. While trying to rescue her they fall in love, and each gets a second chance at a new life. Beauty in the Broken
